Table of Contents

Interface IArticleService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for managing article-related business logic and operations. Acts as an abstraction layer between UI/presentation and data repositories, coordinating article retrieval, state changes (read/star/favorite), search, cleanup, and statistics.

public interface IArticleService

Remarks

This service centralizes all article-related use cases in the RSS reader application, ensuring consistent business rules, validation, and transaction boundaries. It delegates persistence to IArticleRepository and related repositories.

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns and prevent leaking persistence details to the presentation layer.

Implementations must ensure:

  • All read operations are efficient and memory-safe (pagination, AsNoTracking, server-side filtering).
  • State changes (read/star/favorite/notified/processed) are atomic and logged.
  • Search supports full-text or keyword matching with relevance ordering.
  • Cleanup operations (delete old) are safe and respect user preferences (e.g., starred/favorite protection).
  • Statistics (unread counts) are cached or computed efficiently.
  • Cancellation support for long-running operations via CancellationToken.

Methods

BulkMarkAsNotifiedAsync(List<int>, CancellationToken)

Bulk marks multiple articles as notified.

Task<int> BulkMarkAsNotifiedAsync(List<int> articleIds, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

Thrown if articleIds is null.

Deletes articles older than the specified number of days.

Task<int> DeleteOldArticlesAsync(int daysOld = 30, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

daysOld int

The minimum age in days for an article to be eligible for deletion (default: 30).

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of articles successfully deleted.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if daysOld is negative.

DeleteOlderThanAsync(DateTime, CancellationToken)

Deletes articles older than the specified cutoff date.

Task<int> DeleteOlderThanAsync(DateTime cutoffDate, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

cutoffDate DateTime

The cutoff date; articles older than this will be deleted.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of articles successfully deleted.

Remarks

This operation protects starred and favorite articles from deletion.

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<List<ArticleSummaryDto>>

A list of article summaries.

Remarks

This method is intended for administrative or export scenarios. Prefer GetPagedArticlesAsync(int, int, ArticleStatus?, CancellationToken) for display purposes.

Parameters

Parameters

The search term (case-insensitive).

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<List<ArticleSummaryDto>>

A list of matching article summaries, ordered by relevance.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if searchText is null or whitespace.
